pages.text: $(bred)Old Zombie$() is Newspaper Zombie who is reading another kind of newspaper.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)90$()$(br)$(bred)Paper Health$() : $(l)40$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Little Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : When its newspaper broken, it will be immediately angered, and then increase its speed to $(l)Very Fast$() and damage to $(l)Normal$().
